A portion of these revenues, known as the reserve factor, will be captured into the protocol’s treasury. title: Arthur Hayes cashes out $5.1M in HYPE after 126x price prediction
body: A few weeks after publicly predicting a 126x rally for the token, BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes sold off his $5.1 million worth of HYPE holdings. According to Lookonchain’s on-chain data, Hayes made an estimated $823,000 in profit from the sale of 96,628 HYPE tokens, which i s 19 .2 % ab ove his initial investment. According to Hayes, the sale was partially made to pay for a deposit on a Ferrari Testarossa. Since Hayes advocated for HYPE’s long-term potential at the August WebX Asia conference, his sudden exit has sparked controversy. There, he argued that the adoption of stablecoins and the growth in decentralized exchange revenue from Hyperliquid could drive the token to all-time high valuations. Need to pay my deposit on the new Rari 849 Testarossa https://t.co/PX7Hx0FuK9 — Arthur Hayes (@CryptoHayes) September 21, 2025 Token unlocks raise market concerns The sale comes after growing controversy over Hyperliquid’s tokenomics . According to Maelstrom’s research, which Hayes cited , 237.8 million HYPE tokens will vest progressively over a 24-month period. This means that almost $500 million worth of supply enters the market each month. According to the analysis, buybacks at their current level can only cover 17% of the new supply, which could result in a monthly overhang of $410 million. Despite its substantial year-to-date gains, market observers warn that such pressure could have a significant impact on HYPE’s performance. “With the crown comes the Sword of Damocles: HYPE is about to face its first true test.” ~ Arthur Hayes Since its late November launch at $6.51, HYPE has already risen by 660% to pass $49. However, it remains uncertain whether Hyperliquid’s growing exchange revenues will be enough to cover the likely outpouring of tokens because of unlock-related risks. His departure has sparked speculation that Hayes may be redistributing into other assets. ASTER, a recently launched token, was recommended by some analysts as a possible investment for their money. Yoshitaka, a cryptocurrency analyst, noted that Hayes’s sudden change in direction raises eyebrows among investors since it is out of character with his previous strong support for HYPE. This won’t be the first time Hayes has sold sizable holdings while publicly retaining a bullish outlook, as Cryptopolitan reported . Despite predicting a “monster altseason,” he reportedly sold off more than $13 million worth of assets earlier this year, including ETH, ENA, and PEPE. Price reaction and technical outlook After Hayes’ sale, HYPE underperformed overall market movements, dropping 8.3% in 24 hours. As of this writing, the token is currently trading at $49.9. According to Finora AI Global, the immediate demand level is $52.346. Further lower declines can be seen if the price falls below $52.054 or $50.558. If the token remains near its current support, there is still a possibility for interim gains towards $54.482. A stronger reversal would be confirmed only when the price rises above $59.928 with stable trading volume. Hype / USDT perpetual contract. Source:X Data from DeFiLlama shows that Hyperliquid’s trading volume has grown dramatically, rising from $560 million in early August to an unprecedented peak of $3.4 billion. Hayes maintains his general optimism for cryptocurrency outside of HYPE. He has reaffirmed his goal of $250,000 in Bitcoin by the end of 2025. Last week, he also argued that after the U.S. Treasury meets its $850 billion General Account target, cryptocurrency markets will return to being “up only.” However, it’s unclear if Hayes will return to HYPE. title: FF Token White Paper: Falcon Finance Unveils Crucial Details for Its Future
body: BitcoinWorld FF Token White Paper: Falcon Finance Unveils Crucial Details for Its Future The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with anticipation as Falcon Finance takes a significant leap forward, officially releasing the FF token white paper . This pivotal document provides a comprehensive blueprint for its native FF token, laying out the foundation for its ecosystem and future trajectory. For anyone invested in the evolving landscape of decentralized finance, understanding these details is absolutely crucial. What Does the FF Token White Paper Reveal About Its Supply? Falcon Finance has unveiled the core mechanics of its FF token, which boasts a substantial total supply of 10 billion tokens. This foundational aspect dictates how the token will be distributed and utilized across its various functions. The white paper meticulously outlines the strategic allocation plan, designed to foster sustainable growth and robust community involvement. Here’s a breakdown of the FF token’s allocation: Ecosystem Growth: 35% is dedicated to expanding the Falcon Finance ecosystem, ensuring resources for future development and partnerships. Foundation: 32.2% supports the operational backbone and long-term vision of the Falcon Finance foundation. Team and Contributors: 20% is allocated to the talented individuals and teams driving the project forward, incentivizing innovation and commitment. Community Airdrops and Launchpads: A significant 8.3% is reserved for the community, distributed through airdrops and launchpads to foster early adoption and engagement. Other Investors: 4.5% accounts for other strategic investors, broadening the project’s financial backing. These allocations demonstrate a balanced approach, prioritizing both foundational stability and vibrant community participation. A total of 2.34 billion tokens are scheduled for release at the Token Generation Event (TGE), marking the official debut of FF tokens into the market. How Will the FF Token Power Falcon Finance’s Ecosystem? Beyond its initial distribution, the FF token white paper clearly defines the token’s integral role within the Falcon Finance ecosystem. FF is not merely a digital asset; it is the core utility token that will drive various decentralized finance (DeFi) applications and facilitate transactions within the platform. This means that users engaging with Falcon Finance’s offerings will find FF indispensable for participation. The utility of FF tokens extends to: DeFi Applications: Serving as the primary medium for interaction within Falcon Finance’s suite of DeFi products. Transaction Fees: Used to pay for fees incurred across the ecosystem, streamlining operations and providing a consistent value proposition. The company previously conducted a successful presale for FF on September 10, utilizing the access platform Biddle Pad. This early event generated significant interest, indicating strong market confidence ahead of the full public release. The presale allowed early supporters to acquire FF tokens, paving the way for wider adoption following the TGE. Why is Community Allocation a Game-Changer for the FF Token White Paper? The 8.3% allocation specifically for community airdrops and launchpads highlighted in the FF token white paper is a particularly noteworthy aspect. In the competitive crypto space, genuine community engagement is paramount for long-term success. By directly allocating a substantial portion to its community, Falcon Finance is signaling a commitment to decentralization and empowering its user base. This strategic move offers several benefits: Broadened Distribution: Airdrops and launchpads ensure a wider distribution of tokens, preventing concentration in a few hands. Increased Adoption: Community members receiving tokens are more likely to use and promote the ecosystem. Stronger Network Effect: A larger, engaged community fosters a robust network, essential for DeFi project vitality. Early Engagement: Encourages participation from the outset, building a loyal user base. This approach can significantly contribute to the project’s organic growth and resilience, as a dedicated community often acts as the strongest advocate and developer of an ecosystem. The emphasis on community in the FF token white paper suggests a forward-thinking strategy for sustained relevance. What’s Next for Falcon Finance After the FF Token White Paper Release? With the release of the FF token white paper , Falcon Finance has laid out its ambitious vision for the future. The roadmap ahead involves the continued development of its DeFi applications, expanding partnerships, and fostering a vibrant, active community around the FF token. The ecosystem growth allocation underscores this commitment to ongoing innovation and expansion. Investors and enthusiasts alike will be closely watching for: Further details on specific DeFi applications powered by FF. Announcements regarding new partnerships and integrations. The exact timing and mechanisms of upcoming community airdrops and launchpad events. The clarity provided by the white paper offers a solid foundation for understanding Falcon Finance’s potential impact on the decentralized finance sector. It sets the stage for a new chapter where the FF token plays a central role in shaping a more accessible and efficient financial future. Concluding Thoughts on the FF Token White Paper The release of the FF token white paper marks a pivotal moment for Falcon Finance. It provides a transparent and detailed overview of the token’s design, utility, and distribution, highlighting a strong commitment to ecosystem development and community empowerment. With a clear allocation strategy and defined use cases in DeFi, the FF token is poised to become a significant player in the evolving crypto landscape. As Falcon Finance moves forward, its success will undoubtedly hinge on the execution of this well-articulated vision and the continued engagement of its growing community. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the total supply of FF tokens? A1: The total supply of Falcon Finance’s FF token is 10 billion tokens. Q2: How much of the FF token supply is allocated to the community? A2: A significant 8.3% of the total FF token supply is allocated for community airdrops and launchpads. Q3: What is the primary use case for the FF token? A3: The FF token serves as the core utility token within the Falcon Finance ecosystem, used for various DeFi applications and transaction fees. Q4: When were the first FF tokens released? A4: A total of 2.34 billion tokens are set to be released at the Token Generation Event (TGE). Falcon Finance also conducted a presale for FF on September 10. Q5: Where can I find more detailed information about FF tokenomics? A5: All detailed information regarding FF tokenomics and the project’s vision is available in the official FF token white paper . Share Your Insights! Did you find this breakdown of the FF token white paper helpful? We encourage you to share this article with your network on social media. Your engagement helps us continue to deliver valuable insights into the dynamic world of cryptocurrency. Join the conversation and let us know your thoughts on Falcon Finance’s latest announcement! title: MUTM Could Be the Best Crypto to Invest in Before BTC Hits $150K, Here’s Why Analysts Agree
body: Analysts across the industry are projecting that Bitcoin (BTC) will move toward $150,000 in the coming market cycle. Historically, when Bitcoin (BTC)’s value surges, investors not only gain exposure to BTC itself but also look for high-growth projects that can outperform. This trend often leads to capital flowing into altcoins that are still early in their journey. Among these, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is gaining attention as a DeFi project designed with real utility and infrastructure that could stand out as Bitcoin (BTC) climbs. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is not positioning itself as just another token tied to speculation. Instead, it is building a foundation of decentralized finance tools: a stablecoin designed to hold $1 in value, lending and borrowing mechanisms backed by collateral, and an oracle-driven system for accurate price discovery and risk management. These are the kinds of systems that investors and users turn to when markets heat up and volatility rises. Stablecoin Utility During BTC Rallies One of the most attractive aspects of Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will be its stablecoin design. The token is created only when users borrow against assets like ETH or BTC and is removed from circulation when loans are repaid or liquidated. This approach means people do not have to sell their Bitcoin (BTC) or Ethereum to access liquidity—they will be able to borrow against them while keeping their exposure intact. During a BTC rally toward $150,000, this will become especially valuable because users often want to maintain their position while still unlocking funds to use in other investments or real-world expenses. The stability mechanism goes further. Interest rates on borrowing this stablecoin will not be left to chance or speculative markets but will be adjusted through governance to help keep the peg close to $1. If the stablecoin trades higher than $1, the rate can be lowered; if it dips below, the rate can rise. Combined with arbitrage opportunities and automatic liquidations on under-collateralized loans, the system is designed to stay balanced even in periods of market turbulence. To make this work, reliable pricing data is essential. Mutuum will rely on established oracle feeds such as Chainlink to bring verified asset prices into its system. Oracles serve as the lifeline for liquidations and borrowing, especially when BTC swings sharply. The roadmap also accounts for fallback oracles, aggregated feeds, and decentralized exchange data as backup references. This layered design helps ensure that liquidations and valuations happen fairly and on time, a safeguard that gives lenders and borrowers confidence. Presale Momentum and Early Entry Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is currently in its presale, which places it in a unique position compared to Bitcoin (BTC)’s maturity. Phase 6 is live at $0.035, with 45% of the tokens in this round already sold, more than $16.10 million raised, and over 16,500 holders onboard. The next phase will lift the price to $0.040, a 15% increase, which creates urgency for those watching from the sidelines. Investors who enter during this phase lock in a lower entry point before the next price step, while the presale continues to attract attention as a rare early-stage opportunity. Staking and Long-Term Value Creation Beyond borrowing and lending, Mutuum is introducing a staking mechanism through mtTokens. When users deposit assets into liquidity pools, they will receive mtTokens representing their share. These mtTokens can then be staked in designated smart contracts to earn MUTM rewards. On top of this, the platform plans to use its revenue for open-market buybacks of MUTM tokens, which are then distributed to stakers. This creates a system of compounding rewards that Bitcoin (BTC) does not provide, giving long-term holders of MUTM a way to steadily grow their position. Mutuum’s roadmap further highlights how early this project still is. Phase 1, which included the presale launch, initial marketing campaigns, a CertiK audit, and tracking platform listings, has been largely executed. Phase 2 will involve building core smart contracts, the front-end app, and back-end infrastructure, alongside code reviews and analytics development. Phase 3 focuses on finalizing the system with testnet demos, additional audits, security checks, and exchange listing preparations. Phase 4 will deliver the live platform, exchange listings for MUTM, activation of claims, regional compliance, and multi-chain expansion. Compared to Bitcoin (BTC)’s long-established role, Mutuum is only just beginning, which is where growth opportunities often lie. Why Analysts See MUTM as a Strategic Play The reason analysts are aligning with MUTM at this stage is simple: Bitcoin (BTC)’s rally toward $150,000 will dominate headlines, but the largest profits often come from projects that build critical infrastructure around it. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) combines a decentralized stablecoin, lending and borrowing features, oracle-driven precision, staking rewards, and a clearly defined roadmap. With its presale still active at just $0.035, investors have a chance to enter at an early level before Bitcoin (BTC) reaches its next milestone. Riding BTC’s growth is a proven path, but pairing it with a project like Mutuum Finance (MUTM) offers the chance to capture multiples in the same cycle. title: Pundit to XRP Investors: Ripple Is Close to an Agreement With SWIFT
body: Recent conversations within the digital asset community have been marked by speculation surrounding a possible connection between Ripple and SWIFT , the global payments messaging network. Such a prospect has generated heightened interest, as it touches on one of the most debated areas in the future of cross-border settlements. Bale (@AltcoinBale), a well-known crypto figure on X, posted that his sources informed him Ripple is close to reaching an agreement with SWIFT. He called the situation “BREAKING” and urged followers to take notice. While the claim remains unconfirmed, its meaning is clear. If true, Ripple’s technology could play a role in modernizing SWIFT’s international payments framework. For XRP, the native digital asset tied to Ripple’s operations, integration into a global standard for banking transactions would mark a turning point in real-world adoption . BREAKING My sources are telling me RIPPLE is close to an agreement with SWIFT for cross border settlements. Lock the fuck in right now. — BALE (@AltcoinBale) September 20, 2025 Why It Would Benefit XRP XRP has long been positioned as a faster, cheaper, and more scalable alternative to legacy systems used to move money across borders. Traditional SWIFT processes rely heavily on correspondent banks, manual reconciliation, and settlement times that can stretch to several days. Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse has previously called SWIFT’s system outdated , and the costs associated with those delays often fall on businesses and individuals trying to move money globally. By contrast, XRP transactions settle in seconds, with much lower fees, and function on a decentralized ledger without reliance on intermediaries. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 If SWIFT were to adopt Ripple’s technology and integrate XRP, the partnership could help transition the network from its decades-old infrastructure into a new phase of efficiency. For SWIFT, the benefit would be the ability to maintain its central role in the global financial system while addressing long-standing criticisms of slow speed and high cost. For XRP, it would provide unprecedented validation as a digital asset capable of scaling to meet the demands of global finance. Will XRP Replace SWIFT? Supporters of XRP have always argued that integration with SWIFT or a total overhaul would represent the kind of adoption long-awaited by the digital asset community. While some questioned Bale’s claims, many approved of this potential development. These reports are currently unconfirmed. XRP has sufficient liquidity, offering fast and cheap transactions, which could bring the global cross-border payments system into a new age. However, at press time, there is no indication that both parties are collaborating. Follow us on X , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post Pundit to XRP Investors: Ripple Is Close to an Agreement With SWIFT appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: Urgent Alert: Bithumb Temporarily Halts ADD Withdrawals for Critical Wallet Maintenance
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent Alert: Bithumb Temporarily Halts ADD Withdrawals for Critical Wallet Maintenance Crypto users often face unexpected events, and a recent announcement from Bithumb, a prominent South Korean cryptocurrency exchange, has caught the attention of many. The exchange has temporarily suspended ADD withdrawals , citing essential wallet maintenance. This development, which commenced on September 22 at 9:10 a.m. UTC, is crucial for anyone holding ADD on the platform. Understanding why these suspensions occur and what they mean for your digital assets is paramount in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency. Why Were ADD Withdrawals Temporarily Halted? Wallet maintenance is a standard, yet critical, operation within cryptocurrency exchanges. Bithumb’s official statement indicates the temporary halt on ADD withdrawals is for this reason. These procedures are vital for ensuring the long-term security, stability, and efficiency of the exchange’s infrastructure. During maintenance, exchanges often: Upgrade software for enhanced performance. Implement new security protocols. Address technical issues or bugs. While inconvenient, these measures ultimately benefit users by safeguarding funds and ensuring a more robust trading environment. Bithumb prioritizes system integrity, making these pauses necessary for secure ADD withdrawals and other transactions. What This Means for Your ADD Withdrawals and Assets The immediate impact of this suspension is straightforward: you cannot move your ADD tokens out of your Bithumb wallet. This temporary restriction on ADD withdrawals means any plans to transfer assets will be postponed. Trading of ADD might still be possible, but withdrawals remain paused. For users relying on quick access, such suspensions can be frustrating. However, remain calm. Your assets are generally safe, as maintenance is designed to protect them. The exchange usually provides updates on progress and an estimated resumption time for ADD withdrawals . Key considerations during a withdrawal suspension: Patience: These are usually temporary measures. Stay Informed: Check Bithumb’s official announcements. Assess Urgency: If no immediate need for ADD, simply wait for service resumption. Navigating Exchange Maintenance: Your Guide to Secure ADD Withdrawals and Beyond Encountering a temporary suspension of services, such as ADD withdrawals , is not uncommon. Learning how to navigate these situations effectively can save you stress. A proactive approach to managing crypto assets involves understanding exchange operational realities. Here are some actionable insights: Verify Information: Always confirm announcements directly on official channels. Diversify Holdings: Avoid keeping all assets on a single exchange. Spread crypto across multiple reputable platforms or personal wallets to mitigate risks. Understand Self-Custody: For long-term holdings, consider hardware wallets for full control. This eliminates reliance on exchange status for ADD withdrawals . Monitor Market Sentiment: Avoid panic selling based solely on a temporary service halt. Bithumb’s temporary suspension of ADD withdrawals reminds us that crypto offers freedom but also responsibilities and occasional operational pauses. By staying informed and adopting best practices, you can confidently manage digital assets even when exchanges undergo necessary improvements. In conclusion, Bithumb’s decision to temporarily halt ADD withdrawals stems from crucial wallet maintenance, a common practice to enhance security and system performance. While inconvenient, it underscores the exchange’s commitment to a safe environment. Users are advised to monitor Bithumb’s official channels for updates and practice prudent asset management. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: When will Bithumb resume ADD withdrawals? A1: Bithumb has not provided a specific resumption time. Monitor their official channels for updates. Q2: Is my ADD safe on Bithumb during this maintenance? A2: Yes, your ADD assets are generally safe. Maintenance enhances security, it doesn’t jeopardize funds. The suspension is a precautionary measure. Q3: Can I still trade ADD on Bithumb during the suspension? A3: Typically, a withdrawal suspension doesn’t affect trading. You might still buy or sell ADD, but withdrawals are paused. Q4: What is “wallet maintenance”? A4: Wallet maintenance involves routine technical upgrades, security enhancements, and system checks by exchanges for secure operation. Q5: What should I do if I need to access my ADD urgently? A5: If ADD withdrawals are suspended, you must wait until maintenance is complete. Always plan ahead for critical transactions. Did you find this update helpful? Staying informed helps everyone navigate the dynamic crypto landscape more effectively! Its architecture includes the 0G Chain (an EVM-compatible Layer 1), 0G Storage (for large datasets), 0G Data Availability (for scalable data access) and 0G Compute (for AI model training and inference). title: GPU Tokenization: GAIB’s $30M Partnership Unleashes Revolutionary AI Infrastructure
body: BitcoinWorld GPU Tokenization: GAIB’s $30M Partnership Unleashes Revolutionary AI Infrastructure The convergence of artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency is creating exciting new possibilities. GAIB, a visionary crypto AI startup, has announced a significant $30 million partnership with Siam.AI, a prominent AI data center operator based in Thailand. This strategic alliance is poised to revolutionize AI infrastructure development through an innovative approach: GPU tokenization . This groundbreaking initiative is not merely about expanding data centers; it aims to democratize access to powerful computing resources by converting them into digital, tradable assets on the decentralized market. What Exactly is GPU Tokenization and Why Does it Matter? At its core, GPU tokenization involves transforming physical Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) – the powerhouse components essential for intensive AI computations – into digital tokens on a blockchain. Imagine owning a verifiable, digital piece of a supercomputer, accessible to a broader range of investors. This method allows GAIB to raise capital in the decentralized market by offering investors fractional ownership or access rights to these high-demand GPUs. Democratizing Access: It opens up investment opportunities for a wider range of participants, moving beyond traditional institutional investors. Enhanced Liquidity: Tokenized assets can be traded more easily and quickly on decentralized exchanges, increasing market efficiency. Transparent Funding: Blockchain technology provides an immutable and transparent record of all transactions, fostering greater trust and accountability. Scalable Infrastructure: The funds raised through this tokenization directly support the expansion of critical AI computing power, addressing a vital industry need. This initiative directly addresses the growing global demand for robust AI infrastructure, which often acts as a bottleneck for many AI projects. By making GPUs accessible through tokenized assets, GAIB and Siam.AI are paving the way for a more distributed, efficient, and inclusive future for AI development. The GAIB and Siam.AI Partnership: A $30 Million Vision for AI The collaboration between GAIB and Siam.AI exemplifies the increasing convergence of AI and blockchain technologies. Siam.AI, with its established expertise in operating advanced AI data centers, provides the essential physical infrastructure and operational know-how. GAIB, on the other hand, brings its innovative financial model of GPU tokenization to the table, aiming to fund the crucial expansion of Siam.AI’s facilities. This substantial $30 million collaboration specifically targets boosting Siam.AI’s capacity, which will, in turn, support numerous AI projects requiring intensive computational power. The Daily Hodl reported on this significant development, highlighting its potential impact on both the crypto and AI sectors. This is more than just a financial transaction; it represents a strategic alignment designed to create a symbiotic ecosystem where blockchain finance directly fuels AI growth. The overarching goal is clear: to build a more powerful, accessible, and resilient AI computing backbone for the rapidly evolving digital age. Navigating the Future of Decentralized AI Infrastructure with GPU Tokenization While the prospects of GPU tokenization are incredibly exciting and transformative, it is important to acknowledge the inherent challenges. Regulatory landscapes around tokenized assets are still evolving globally, and market volatility remains a significant factor in the broader crypto space. However, the benefits of this innovative model – particularly its ability to foster decentralized, community-driven investment in essential infrastructure – offer a compelling vision for the future of technology. This partnership serves as a powerful example of how blockchain technology can provide novel funding mechanisms for real-world assets and critical technological advancements. As AI continues to integrate into nearly every aspect of our lives, the demand for powerful, scalable, and accessible computing resources will only intensify. Projects like GAIB and Siam.AI’s initiative demonstrate a proactive and forward-thinking approach to meeting this escalating demand. Actionable Insight: For those interested in the dynamic convergence of AI and crypto, observing the success and scalability of such tokenization models will be key. These initiatives could potentially set new precedents for how other high-demand physical assets are financed and utilized in a decentralized future. A Glimpse into Tomorrow: The Impact of Tokenized GPUs The collaboration between GAIB and Siam.AI represents a significant leap forward in the journey towards decentralized AI. By leveraging GPU tokenization , they are not only securing crucial funding for infrastructure expansion but also creating a novel and accessible investment vehicle. This model has the potential to redefine how we perceive and access high-performance computing, making it more open, efficient, and globally distributed. It’s a bold step towards a future where AI development is less constrained by traditional funding models and more empowered by community participation through blockchain. Frequently Asked Questions about GPU Tokenization Here are some common questions about this exciting development: What is the primary goal of the GAIB and Siam.AI partnership? The partnership aims to expand Siam.AI’s AI data center infrastructure using funds raised through GAIB’s innovative GPU tokenization initiative, making high-performance computing more accessible. How does GPU tokenization benefit investors? GPU tokenization allows investors to gain fractional ownership or access rights to powerful GPUs through digital tokens, offering enhanced liquidity and transparency in the decentralized market. What kind of infrastructure will the $30 million investment support? The $30 million investment will specifically support the expansion of Siam.AI’s data center capacity, providing more robust computing power for various AI projects. Are there any challenges associated with GPU tokenization? Yes, challenges include navigating evolving regulatory landscapes and managing market volatility within the crypto space, similar to other tokenized assets. Why is this partnership important for the AI industry? This partnership provides a novel, decentralized funding model for essential AI infrastructure, addressing the growing demand for computing power and potentially accelerating AI development globally. Found this article insightful? Share your thoughts on this groundbreaking GPU tokenization initiative and its potential impact on AI infrastructure by sharing this article on your social media channels! To learn more about the latest AI infrastructure trends, explore our article on key developments shaping GPU tokenization future price action . This post GPU Tokenization: GAIB’s $30M Partnership Unleashes Revolutionary AI Infrastructure first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Die Bären sind los? Warum Bitcoin und Co. jetzt abstürzen
body: Der Kryptomarkt hat einen heftigen Rückschlag erlebt und Milliardenverluste verzeichnet. Über 407.000 Händler mussten ihre Positionen aufgeben, weil die Kurse schnell fielen. Besonders Ethereum und kleinere Coins wie Dogecoin und Solana waren betroffen. Plötzlich rauschten die Kurse nach unten: Innerhalb von nur einem Tag verloren viele Kryptowährungen deutlich an Wert. Für mehr als 400.000 Trader bedeutete das massive Verluste. Auch wenn Bitcoin nur leicht nachgab, traf es vor allem Ethereum und die kleineren Coins hart. Experten sehen in der Unsicherheit der Weltwirtschaft einen wichtigen Auslöser. Ein Tag voller Verluste An nur einem Tag gingen über 1,5 Milliarden Dollar verloren. Der Grund: Viele Händler hatten auf steigende Kurse gesetzt, doch die Kurse entwickelten sich genau in die andere Richtung. Weil sie dabei Kredite nutzten, also mit sogenanntem Hebel handelten, wurden ihre Positionen zwangsweise geschlossen. Liquidation Alert In the past 24 hours: ✦ 406,205 traders were liquidated ✦ Total liquidations reached $1.69 billion ✦ Largest single liquidation: $12.74M #OKX – BTC-USDT-SWAP. Liquidation Breakdown: Longs: $1.61B Shorts: $83.48M #Crypto #Liquidations $BTC … pic.twitter.com/k4G3RWhOFE — CryptOpus (@ImCryptOpus) September 22, 2025 Das nennt man Liquidation. Wenn der Kurs zu stark fällt, reicht die Sicherheitsleistung der Trader nicht mehr aus. Dann schließt die Handelsplattform automatisch die Positionen. Das kann wie eine Lawine wirken und noch mehr Verkäufe auslösen. Ethereum rutscht stark ab Ethereum, die zweitgrößte Kryptowährung, fiel zeitweise um 9% auf 4.075 Dollar. Allein hier wurden fast eine halbe Milliarde Dollar an Long-Positionen beendet. Am Ende lag der Tagesverlust noch immer bei rund 6%. Eigentlich hatte ETH in den letzten Woche deutlich Stärke gezeigt. Bitcoin hielt sich etwas besser, rutschte aber auch um fast 3% nach unten und fiel auf knapp 112.000 Dollar. Nach einem kurzen Rückgang konnte sich Bitcoin etwas stabilisieren, doch die allgemeine Unsicherheit bleibt. Kleinere Coins verlieren noch mehr Besonders deutlich waren die Verluste bei den kleineren Kryptowährungen. Dogecoin stürzte um mehr als 10% ab und war damit der größte Verlierer. Auch Solana , Cardano, BNB und Tron verloren kräftig, alle mindestens 5% innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Gerade für Kleinanleger, die oft in solche Coins investieren, war das ein schwerer Schlag. Viele hatten auf schnelle Gewinne gehofft, doch die starke Verkaufswelle drehte den Markt ins Negative. Was Liquidationen verraten Liquidationen zeigen nicht nur Verluste, sie geben auch Hinweise auf die Stimmung im Markt. Wenn viele Long-Positionen aufgelöst werden, bedeutet das oft, dass die Hoffnung auf steigende Kurse zu groß war. Manchmal ist genau dann ein Tiefpunkt erreicht. In the last 24 hours: 107,066 traders liquidated Total liquidations: $400.95M Biggest single order: $7.83M on BitMEX (XBTZ25)The markets aren’t playing around. #WiseCrypto #Liquidations #Bitcoin pic.twitter.com/LYN4qlHgJL — Wise Crypto (@WiseCrypto_) August 19, 2025 Andersherum können Liquidationen von Short-Positionen, also Wetten auf fallende Kurse, eine Erholung andeuten. Profis schauen deshalb genau auf diese Daten, weil sie dabei helfen, den nächsten Trend frühzeitig zu erkennen. Unsicherheit durch die Weltwirtschaft Die Verluste haben auch mit den weltweiten Finanzmärkten zu tun. Zwar hat die US-Notenbank die Zinsen zuletzt gesenkt, doch die allgemeine Lage bleibt angespannt. Investoren warten gespannt auf neue Wirtschaftsdaten wie die Arbeitslosenzahlen und die Rede des Fed-Chefs. Der Marktstratege Nassar Achkar sagt, dass Bitcoin in dieser unsicheren Zeit wohl stärker bleibt als andere Coins. Ethereum und kleinere Projekte könnten dagegen weniger Chancen haben, schnell wieder nach oben zu kommen. Wie es weitergehen könnte Die kommenden Tage sind entscheidend. Sollte die US-Notenbank eine eher lockere Haltung zeigen, könnte das die Stimmung verbessern. Dann hätten vor allem die Altcoins eine Chance auf eine kleine Erholung. Hier gehts zu einem Artikel über den Binance Coin (BNB) und warum er gerade so performt. Doch bleibt die Lage angespannt, drohen weitere Rückschläge. Für Anleger heißt das: Vorsicht ist wichtig, und wer investiert, sollte genau hinschauen, wo mögliche Risiken lauern. Ohne Risiko investieren geht nicht, das ist klar. Aber durch gründliche Rechereche können Investoren doch zumindest Risiken minimieren. Ein Projekt, was derzeit immer mehr an Fahrt gewinnt ist Bitcoin Hyper. Bitcoin Hyper: Bitcoin endlich schnell und smart Bitcoin Hyper bringt frischen Wind in die Krypto-Welt: ein Layer-2, das Bitcoins Sicherheit mit der Geschwindigkeit von Solana kombiniert. Das bedeutet blitzschnelle Transaktionen, extrem niedrige Gebühren und echte Smart-Contract-Power – direkt auf Bitcoin. Über die sichere Canonical Bridge können Nutzer BTC ins Netzwerk bringen und als Wrapped BTC in DeFi, Games oder Apps einsetzen. So wird Bitcoin nicht mehr nur „digitales Gold“, sondern endlich auch ein Werkzeug für moderne Anwendungen. Hier eine ausführliche Prognose zu Bitcoin Hyper! $HYPER Presale: Die Chance ganz am Anfang Das $HYPER-Token ist der Treibstoff für dieses neue Ökosystem – für Transaktionen, Staking mit hohen Rewards und Community-Mitbestimmung. Im Presale gibt es die Coins zum günstigsten Preis, fair verteilt ohne Insider-Deals. Erfahrung zeigt: Wer bei starken Projekten früh dabei ist, hat die besten Chancen auf hohe Gewinne. Gerade jetzt, wo durch Zinssenkungen wieder mehr Geld in Altcoins fließt und Krypto allgemein Rückenwind von Unternehmen bekommt, könnte Bitcoin Hyper der nächste große Gewinner werden. Wer rechtzeitig einsteigt, könnte überproportional profitieren. Jetzt rechtzeitig einsteigen und $HYPER im Presale kaufen.

title: Analysts Predict XYZverse Could Outpace Avalanche in Adoption This Cycle
body: Market observers are pointing to XYZverse as a project to watch closely. Growing interest suggests it may soon attract more users than Avalanche has so far. Unique features and steady momentum are fueling this rise. What’s driving experts to favor XYZverse right now, and what sets it apart from its rival? The answer may surprise many. Avalanche: The Fast, Green Chain Racing Ahead in the Crypto Sprint Avalanche, or AVAX, is a fresh Layer-1 network built for speed and care for the planet. It moves value at up to 4,500 transactions per second and settles each deal in under two seconds. Fees stay tiny, so small payments make sense. The magic comes from three linked roads, called X-Chain, C-Chain, and P-Chain, that split work and avoid jams. A special mix of voting rules, drawn from both old and new block ideas, keeps the system safe. Users can even launch their own mini-chains, called Subnets, with only a few clicks. AVAX powers it all, paying for fees, rewards, and custom tokens. Right now, the market is hunting for chains that mix low cost with high speed, and Avalanche fits that wish list. While older leaders like Ethereum face crowded lanes and high tolls, AVAX offers a smoother ride. Its Subnet idea also draws game studios and finance apps that want their own space without starting from zero. If the next cycle favors real use rather than hype, a token that fuels fast, green, and flexible rails could shine. For many watchers, that makes AVAX an appealing pick at current prices. Price Prediction for XYZVerse ($XYZ): Is a 30x Jump Possible? XYZVerse has entered the meme coin market at a time when community-driven tokens continue to dominate speculative trading. The rise of meme coins like PEPE, Dogwifhat, and Bonk proves that strong branding, viral marketing, and community engagement can drive massive gains. The broader market sentiment also plays a key role in XYZVerse’s potential. As the altcoin season is about to start, lower-cap meme coins are seeing increased investor interest. Given that XYZVerse is still in presale, it could benefit from this wave if it secures strategic exchange listings and maintains community hype post-launch. Key Strengths of XYZVerse in the Current Market: Strong branding with sports and influencer partnerships, broadening its appeal Deflationary mechanics (17.13% token burn) to reduce supply pressure Liquidity allocation (15%) to support stability after launch Community incentives (10%) fostering engagement and holding Price Prediction for $XYZ Current Presale Price: $0.0055 Projected Post-Presale Target: $0.10 (as per project’s estimates) Potential ATH (First 1-2 Weeks Post-Launch): $0.15 - $0.25 (if demand surges and listings drive FOMO) Long-Term Potential (6-12 Months): $0.20 - $0.40 (if the project secures major partnerships and listings) Buy $XYZ Early for Maximum Gains Realistic Expectations: Will XYZ Hit $0.10? A 30x jump from presale to $0.10 is possible but depends on: Strong Exchange Listings – If XYZVerse lands on major CEX platforms like KuCoin, OKX, or Binance, its price could skyrocket on launch day. Sustained Community Growth – Meme coins need viral momentum. If XYZVerse delivers on its sports influencer partnerships, it could drive massive social media engagement. title: Analyst Company CEO Issues Serious Warning for Bitcoin: "Three Indicators Point to Further Declines for Bitcoin!"
body: Bitcoin (BTC), which rose above $117,000 last week with the FED's interest rate cut decision, started the new week with a decline. With Bitcoin falling to $112,000, these declines suggest that declines could deepen further in September, which has historically been known as the weakest month of the year. At this point, analysis firm Alphractal CEO Joao Wedson said that three indicators show that the cycle is exhausted and are giving bearish signals. Accordingly, the Alphractal CEO first said that the Spent Output Profit Ratio (SOPR) Trend Signal is giving bearish signals. SOPR measures whether Bitcoin transactions are profitable or unprofitable on-chain. A reading above 1 indicates sellers are in profit, while a reading below 1 indicates sellers are in loss. According to the current chart, SOPR is currently trending downward, although it remains above 1. This indicates that the profitability from on-chain transactions is decreasing. “The SOPR signal is an excellent tool for detecting when profitability on the blockchain is starting to decline. Never in the history of Bitcoin have investors accumulated so late and at such high prices.” The analyst also noted that the realized price for short-term investors (STH) is at $111,400, which is close to the current market level. A drop below this level could trigger stop-loss sell orders. The analyst recently noted that despite Bitcoin's higher price than in previous cycles, its Sharpe ratio is also weaker, meaning risk-adjusted returns are lower, thus reducing profit potential. Joao Wedson stated that these three indicators signal a decline, and that the social interest will increase again not thanks to Bitcoin, but thanks to altcoins. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Analyst Company CEO Issues Serious Warning for Bitcoin: "Three Indicators Point to Further Declines for Bitcoin!"

title: BNB Investment: CEA Industry’s Ambitious $1.25 Billion Raise
body: BitcoinWorld BNB Investment: CEA Industry’s Ambitious $1.25 Billion Raise The world of cryptocurrency is currently buzzing with exciting news from CEA Industry (BNC), a Nasdaq-listed firm. They’ve just announced ambitious plans to significantly expand their BNB investment holdings, signaling a bold move in the digital asset space. This isn’t just a minor portfolio adjustment; it’s a massive capital raise designed to position the company firmly within the BNB ecosystem. What’s Behind This Massive BNB Investment Push? CEA Industry intends to secure an impressive $1.25 billion to fuel its expanded commitment to BNB. This substantial sum will be acquired through a two-pronged approach: Private Investment in Public Equity (PIPE): The firm plans to raise $500 million via this method. Warrants: An additional $750 million will be secured through the issuance of warrants. This strategic financial maneuver was formally announced when CEA Industry filed a simplified S-3 securities registration form with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on September 19. The filing clearly outlines their future direction, emphasizing a dedicated focus on generating returns specifically from BNB investment . Why is BNB Investment Captivating Institutional Players? Many might wonder why a Nasdaq-listed company would commit such a significant amount to a single cryptocurrency. BNB, the native token of the Binance ecosystem, offers more than just speculative value. It powers the Binance Smart Chain (now BNB Chain), facilitates trading on Binance Exchange, and offers utility across a vast decentralized application (dApp) landscape. Institutions are increasingly recognizing the potential of well-established cryptocurrencies like BNB. Its robust ecosystem, coupled with mechanisms like token burns that reduce supply over time, makes it an attractive asset for long-term growth. For CEA Industry, this expanded BNB investment could unlock new avenues for yield and portfolio diversification within the digital economy. Moreover, a public company like CEA Industry making such a definitive move lends credibility to the broader crypto market. It demonstrates a growing institutional confidence in digital assets as legitimate components of investment portfolios. Are There Risks to This Bold BNB Investment Strategy? While the potential rewards are significant, any substantial move into the cryptocurrency market comes with inherent risks. The crypto landscape is known for its volatility; prices can fluctuate dramatically in short periods. Therefore, CEA Industry’s BNB investment will certainly navigate these market swings. Regulatory scrutiny is another critical factor. The U.S. SEC continues to develop its stance on digital assets, and future regulations could impact the operational environment for firms heavily invested in cryptocurrencies. CEA Industry, as a publicly traded entity, will need to carefully manage these evolving compliance requirements. Furthermore, the success of this strategy hinges on the continued growth and stability of the BNB ecosystem itself. Any challenges faced by the BNB Chain or Binance could directly affect the value of CEA Industry’s holdings. What Does This Mean for the Future of BNB Investment ? CEA Industry’s decision to pursue such a substantial BNB investment could be a bellwether for broader institutional adoption. It highlights a growing trend where traditional financial entities are seeking direct exposure to leading digital assets rather than just indirect participation. For existing BNB holders and enthusiasts, this institutional backing could be seen as a positive indicator, potentially contributing to long-term price stability and ecosystem development. The move signifies a maturation of the crypto market, where sophisticated financial instruments are being deployed for digital asset acquisition. Ultimately, this expansion by CEA Industry sets a precedent. It demonstrates that strategic, large-scale crypto investments are becoming a viable and attractive option for public companies looking to capitalize on the evolving digital financial landscape. It will be fascinating to observe how this ambitious strategy unfolds and its impact on both CEA Industry and the wider BNB ecosystem. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is CEA Industry (BNC)? A1: CEA Industry (BNC) is a Nasdaq-listed company focused on investing in digital assets, specifically expanding its holdings in BNB. Q2: How will CEA Industry raise $1.25 billion for this expansion? A2: The company plans to raise $500 million through a private investment in public equity (PIPE) and an additional $750 million via warrants. Q3: Why is CEA Industry focusing on BNB investment? A3: CEA Industry stated its intention to focus on generating BNB-based returns, leveraging BNB’s utility within the Binance ecosystem and its potential for growth. Q4: What are the potential risks associated with this large-scale BNB investment? A4: Key risks include cryptocurrency market volatility, evolving regulatory environments, and the inherent challenges related to the stability and growth of the BNB ecosystem itself. Q5: What does this move signify for institutional crypto adoption? A5: This significant investment by a Nasdaq-listed firm suggests increasing institutional confidence in leading digital assets like BNB, potentially paving the way for broader corporate involvement in the crypto market. Follow us on social media for the latest updates and discussions. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping BNB price action. title: Jim Cramer slams crypto and gold as Bitcoin erases $1B in longs
body: Jim Cramer returned to X on September 22, warning about what he called the “endless rally of speculation” across gold , crypto , and profitless companies. The post came just hours after one of the sharpest market shakeouts in weeks. I would like to see a pause in the endless rally of speculation, gold. crypto and profitless companies — Jim Cramer (@jimcramer) September 22, 2025 The crypto market was hit particularly hard. In less than 20 minutes, over $1 billion worth of Bitcoin long positions were liquidated as low-liquidity conditions during the Sunday night session triggered a sudden drop. As often happens in these time frames, thin order books amplified the sell-off, creating a washout across the digital asset space. Crypto community is confused Virtually all top-ten cryptocurrencies turned red over the past week, with the sole exception of BNB, which has continued to defy the broader pullback. XRP, Ethereum, and Bitcoin all posted multi-day lows, sparking heated debate among traders. One user responded directly to Cramer’s post, writing: “What rally in crypto are you speaking of? The crypto market has been bearish.” At the same time, gold is charting an entirely different path. The safe-haven asset surged to a new all-time high above $3,726 per ounce on Monday, underscoring its resilience amid global macro uncertainty. Cramer’s comments lumped gold into the same speculative basket as crypto, though for many investors, the divergence highlights the contrasting roles the two assets play: one as a volatile risk asset, the other as a hedge in turbulent times. The question of “profitless companies” remains ambiguous, with Cramer not naming specific stocks. However, the remark points to a familiar theme in his commentary, where unprofitable tech names often come under scrutiny when markets shift toward risk-off sentiment. Despite Cramer’s call for a pause, seasoned traders noted that crypto dips during thin weekend sessions are often bought back into the U.S. market open, a pattern that has played out repeatedly this year. It remains to be seen whether this week follows that script depends on how Bitcoin reacts to the liquidation flush and whether institutional buyers step in at lower levels. The post Jim Cramer slams crypto and gold as Bitcoin erases $1B in longs appeared first on Finbold .

title: Gold breaks new price record as investors move ahead of Fed rate cuts
body: Gold just broke another record. On Monday, spot gold jumped to $3,726.19 per ounce, the highest it’s ever been, before settling at $3,723.81 as of 0950 GMT. U.S. gold futures for December didn’t lag either, climbing 1.4% to $3,758.40. The spike came ahead of a packed week where the Federal Reserve is expected to speak, and new inflation data could set the stage for more rate cuts . Traders are placing bigger bets that the Fed is now well on a dovish path, especially after it just cut interest rates by 25 basis points last Wednesday, its first cut since December. Investors are now pricing in two more cuts this year, one in October with a 93% chance, and another in December at 81%, according to the CME FedWatch Tool. Fed speakers and inflation data drive gold outlook The focus now turns to what Fed officials say this week. Jerome Powell, the Fed Chair, is scheduled to speak on Tuesday, and multiple other officials will speak too. On top of that, core PCE inflation data is dropping Friday. All of this could push the metal even higher if the numbers give the Fed more room to cut again. Giovanni Staunovo, a strategist at UBS, said, “I would expect gold to reach new record highs this week with Fed officials likely to indicate further rate cuts, but also being data dependent on the pace and magnitude of cuts.” According to Staunovo, the Fed is watching the data, but the tone is clear: they’re leaning toward easing. But it’s not just interest rates fueling this move. Staunovo also pointed out that Western investors are finally jumping into gold , especially through ETF holdings, which until now had been mostly ignored by them. “There is a shift in the factors supporting gold. So far it was central banks and Asian demand, now we are also starting to see Western investors looking to add gold, visible in gold ETF holdings, driven by expectations of falling U.S. rates,” he said . That’s a change from what’s driven the yellow metal this year. So far, it’s been up more than 40%, thanks to geopolitical tension, economic uncertainty, and massive central bank buying. But the new player, rate-cut-hungry Western investors, is what’s pushing it into fresh territory now. There’s also some technical pressure adding to the mix. Analysts say prices could keep testing resistance around $3,705, and once it clears that, it might climb into a new range, $3,719 to $3,739. Staunovo added that $3,900 by mid-2026 is a real possibility if this momentum holds. Meanwhile, the rally isn’t just in gold. Silver jumped 1.4% to $43.67, the highest since 2010. Platinum moved up 0.8% to $1,415.09, and palladium added 1.9%, landing at $1,170.63. But all eyes are still locked on the yellow metal, and every sign this week points to more room for it to run. title: Meme Coin Mania Fuels $1.3M in Donations for CZ’s Giggle Academy Education Platform
body: Former Binance CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao’s Giggle Academy education platform raised over $1.3 million in crypto donations within 12 hours of launching its donation feature, with 90% of contributions coming from a single meme coin. The overwhelming response exceeded CZ’s expectations and fundamentally changed his perception of meme coins, which he previously dismissed as lacking utility. The donations came primarily through the “Giggle” token created by Giggle Fund, which charges trading fees in BNB and automatically sends proceeds to Giggle Academy’s donation address. The mechanism generated $900,000 in fees from a token with only a $5 million market capitalization, according to CZ’s X posts . CZ clarified that Giggle Academy did not create the token and has no plans to launch its own crypto. The platform will convert all meme coin donations to major altcoins for operational use, warning donors not to complain about potential selling pressure. The funds will incentivize contributors and accelerate platform growth, while CZ personally covers employee and server costs. Crazy that @GiggleAcademy received more than $1m donations in the first 12 hours of the feature being online. Way beyond my expectations. Lots of good people out there. Lots of good crypto people. 90% of the donations so far came from a meme coin. I still don't get how a $5m… https://t.co/U8vBt3pT1X pic.twitter.com/FIsuGT4Q7R — CZ BNB (@cz_binance) September 22, 2025 When Prison Release Sparked Educational Revolution CZ’s focus on education began during his transition from leading Binance, following a four-month federal prison sentence for money laundering violations that concluded in September 2024. The former crypto executive was released two days early on Friday, September 27, because prisons don’t release inmates on weekends under the US federal code. During his final months at a Long Beach halfway house, CZ received supervised excursions and even attended movies while preparing for his post-prison ventures. He spent five months before incarceration traveling across the United States, networking with entrepreneurs, including OpenAI’s Sam Altman, to discuss potential startup plans. Giggle Academy emerged from CZ’s desire to create a “ maximum positive impact ” by utilizing his software platform expertise to reach hundreds of millions of people. The concept paper , released in February 2024, outlined plans to provide free K-12 education to underprivileged children in developing countries who lack access to traditional schooling. Source: Giggle Academy The platform targets the 781 million illiterate adults worldwide, with 75% concentrated in South Asia, West Asia, and sub-Saharan Africa. CZ’s vision encompasses teaching basic reading, writing, mathematics, science, and non-traditional subjects, including finance, entrepreneurship, blockchain, and artificial intelligence, that current schools typically omit. Giggle Academy deliberately avoids controversial subjects, such as history and religion, to prevent debates on its global platform. The curriculum aims to help children secure better employment opportunities, rather than preparing them for college admission, by focusing on practical skills and job market readiness through gamified learning experiences. From Meme Skeptic to Crypto Charity Convert The donation mechanism began when X user “RUNE” asked CZ whether Giggle Academy would accept token donations, citing examples like Vitalik Buterin’s $1 billion Shiba Inu donation to COVID-19 relief in India. hey @cz_binance , would giggle accept donations from tokens? an utility of memecoins is charity example, vitalik donated hundreds of millions from shiba, or watercoin donated millions to mr beast water project what about a token that has a trading fee and donates automatically… — RUNΞ (@RuneCrypto_) September 21, 2025 CZ initially expressed skepticism about meme coin donations, stating the platform would convert them fully to major cryptocurrencies. RUNE clarified that the proposed system wouldn’t involve direct token transfers but instead would charge BNB trading fees and send the proceeds as donations. This mechanism ensures that there is no negative price impact on the meme coin while generating substantial charitable contributions through trading activity. The Giggle Fund launched shortly after this exchange, creating the automated donation system that generated over $1 million in contributions within hours. The token describes itself as a “ donation coin that directly donates to GiggleAcademy ” and maintains transparent on-chain tracking of all contributions. CZ’s newfound appreciation for meme coin utility contradicts his previous stance on speculative cryptocurrencies. The experience convinced him that meme coins can serve legitimate purposes beyond pure speculation, saying that “ this will forever change my perception of meme coins. Meme coins have utility! ”. Initially, CZ plans to sustain Giggle Academy through future alumni donations from graduates who secure better employment through the platform’s education. The model eliminates traditional revenue streams, making charitable contributions essential for scaling operations and incentivizing high-quality content creators. The post Meme Coin Mania Fuels $1.3M in Donations for CZ’s Giggle Academy Education Platform appeared first on Cryptonews .

How to Choose a Jurisdiction for Your Crypto Startup: SBSB's Guide
body: 2026 will mark a significant milestone for cryptocurrency startups across Europe. The implementation of the MiCA Regulation (Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation) will not leave any crypto company indifferent: the new requirements for licensing, anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) compliance, as well as enhanced corporate governance standards, will pose a real challenge for many startups. But how do you choose the right jurisdiction to successfully adapt to these changes? This question has become critically important for every entrepreneur in the crypto space. In this context, SBSB FinTech Lawyers , an international law firm with over 10 years of experience in fintech and crypto-assets, helps its clients navigate the complex legal environment and select the best location to launch or relocate their business. "The MiCA Regulation will create a unified EU market but also impose high entry barriers. Choosing the right jurisdiction allows businesses to balance costs with opportunities and ensure long-term compliance," commented Ivan Nevzorov, Acting CEO of SBSB FinTech Lawyers. What Should You Consider When Choosing a Jurisdiction? For cryptocurrency startups, the right choice of jurisdiction has become not just important but a strategic decision. What factors influence this choice? Minimum capital requirements Regulatory burden and supervisory practices Transitional regimes before MiCA becomes fully enforceable Availability of banking and payment solutions Reputation of the jurisdiction in the eyes of investors and partners How to Choose a Jurisdiction for Your Crypto Startup? SBSB FinTech Lawyers recommends focusing on a few jurisdictions that offer flexibility, low costs, and the best conditions for crypto companies: Panama : A business-friendly jurisdiction where crypto companies can operate without the need for a license. This provides startups with flexibility, while corporate and tax structures remain simple and cost-efficient. Bosnia and Herzegovina: A country with a developing crypto-friendly environment and relatively low entry barriers. The country's banking sector is open to crypto business accounts, making it attractive for smaller operators. El Salvador: The first country to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender and develop a license for Digital Asset Service Providers (DASP). This provides crypto companies with clear legal recognition and strong government support, but also requires compliance with strict obligations. Why Choose SBSB? At SBSB FinTech Lawyers, we support our clients every step of the way, from analyzing business needs, choosing the right jurisdiction, to obtaining necessary licenses and ensuring a smooth market entry. Our team helps crypto startups and established companies adapt to changing regulatory frameworks while finding the right balance between compliance requirements and business growth. SBSB FinTech Lawyers is an international law firm with over 10 years of experience in fintech, crypto-assets, and regulatory compliance. We assist clients across the EU, Latin America, and Asia, guiding them through jurisdiction selection and ensuring their successful market entry. Our Contacts: sb-sb.com office@sb-sb.com Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Bitmine ETH Holdings Surge: A Remarkable Ascent in Ethereum Investment
body: BitcoinWorld Bitmine ETH Holdings Surge: A Remarkable Ascent in Ethereum Investment In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, significant moves by institutional players often signal broader market trends. Recently, Nasdaq-listed Bitmine (BMNR), a company with a strong focus on Ethereum investments, made headlines with an impressive announcement. The company now boasts substantial Bitmine ETH holdings , reaching an astounding 2,416,054 ETH. This figure represents a remarkable increase of more than 250,000 ETH in just one week. Such rapid accumulation underscores Bitmine’s aggressive strategy and its deep conviction in Ethereum’s long-term value. Investors and enthusiasts are certainly taking note of this powerful expansion. Understanding Bitmine’s Impressive ETH Holdings Growth Bitmine’s latest report highlights a strategic pivot towards significant accumulation. The company’s decision to expand its Bitmine ETH holdings so rapidly is not merely a short-term play. It aligns with a much larger, ambitious vision: to secure over 5% of the total Ethereum supply in the long term. This goal, if achieved, would position Bitmine as a dominant force within the Ethereum ecosystem. It would grant them substantial influence and expose them to significant potential upside as Ethereum continues to evolve. The recent increase demonstrates tangible progress towards this audacious target, providing a clear indicator of their commitment. Significant Accumulation: Over 250,000 ETH added in a single week. Strategic Vision: Long-term goal to hold over 5% of total ETH supply. Market Impact: Potential for increased institutional confidence in Ethereum. Why Bitmine’s Strategy for Ethereum Holdings Matters The implications of Bitmine’s expanding Bitmine ETH holdings extend far beyond the company itself. For the broader crypto market, this institutional confidence can be a powerful catalyst. When a publicly traded company like Bitmine makes such a bold statement, it often encourages other traditional investors to consider similar allocations. Moreover, a significant holder like Bitmine could play a crucial role in the network’s future. Their substantial stake might influence governance decisions and contribute to the stability and security of the Ethereum blockchain. This kind of deep engagement from major entities is often seen as a sign of maturation for the cryptocurrency space. However, this strategy also comes with its own set of challenges. Market volatility remains a constant factor in cryptocurrencies. While the potential for gains is high, so too is the risk of price fluctuations affecting the value of their substantial holdings. Bitmine’s leadership will undoubtedly need to navigate these market dynamics carefully. Navigating the Future: What’s Next for Bitmine and its ETH Holdings? As Bitmine continues to grow its Bitmine ETH holdings , several key areas will be worth watching. Firstly, the pace of their accumulation will indicate their confidence in Ethereum’s immediate future. Are they accelerating their purchases, or maintaining a steady rate? Secondly, their engagement with the Ethereum community and their stance on network upgrades will be vital. A company holding such a significant portion of the supply naturally becomes a stakeholder with a vested interest in the network’s success. Their actions could set precedents for how large institutional players interact with decentralized ecosystems. For investors, Bitmine’s performance could serve as a bellwether for institutional crypto adoption. Their journey will offer valuable insights into the opportunities and complexities of integrating digital assets into traditional financial frameworks. Therefore, closely monitoring their progress becomes an essential part of understanding the evolving crypto landscape. In conclusion, Bitmine’s incredible growth in its Ethereum portfolio is a compelling story of institutional conviction. Their ambitious goal to secure 5% of the total ETH supply, backed by their recent rapid accumulation, positions them as a key player in the future of decentralized finance. This development highlights the increasing mainstream acceptance and long-term potential of Ethereum as a foundational digital asset. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Bitmine (BMNR)? Bitmine (BMNR) is a Nasdaq-listed company that specializes in investments, particularly focusing on Ethereum. They strategically acquire and hold significant amounts of ETH as part of their long-term investment strategy. How much Ethereum does Bitmine currently hold? As of their recent announcement, Bitmine holds 2,416,054 ETH. This represents a substantial increase from the previous week, demonstrating their active accumulation strategy. What is Bitmine’s long-term goal for its ETH holdings? Bitmine has an ambitious long-term goal to secure and hold over 5% of the total circulating supply of Ethereum. This would make them one of the largest institutional holders of ETH globally. Why are Bitmine’s large ETH holdings significant? Bitmine’s significant Bitmine ETH holdings are important because they signal strong institutional confidence in Ethereum. Such large-scale investments by publicly traded companies can influence market sentiment, potentially encouraging further institutional adoption and contributing to Ethereum’s network stability. What are the potential risks associated with Bitmine’s strategy? While the potential for gains is substantial, Bitmine’s strategy is subject to the inherent volatility of the cryptocurrency market. Price fluctuations in Ethereum could significantly impact the value of their holdings, presenting both opportunities and risks. We encourage you to share this insightful article on your social media platforms! Let your network know about Bitmine’s incredible journey in the Ethereum market and spark a conversation about the future of institutional crypto investment. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption . title: NEIRO price dips 20% as Binance confirms contract delisting
body: Amid broader market slumps , Binance deteriorated sentiments among the NEIRO community with plans to delist the alt’s perpetual contract later this week. In a Monday’s notice, the leading exchange confirmed it will close all NEIRO positions on September 26, 2025. Binance Futures @BinanceFutures · Follow Binance Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on USDⓈ-M $NEIROETH perpetual contract at 🗓️Sept. 26 2025, 09:00 (UTC) The contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete.Read more 👇 binance.com/en/support/ann… 1:06 pm · 22 Sept 2025 120 Reply Copy link Read 33 replies Users should close their open positions before this deadline to avoid automatic settlement. From 09:00 UTC on the same day, the NEIROETHUSDT perpetual contract will no longer be available on Binance Futures. Furthermore, the platform will not support new trades from $08:30 UTC on September 26. That means a narrow timeframe to adjust before Binance removes NEIRO entirely. The meme token plunged after the announcement, now down over 20% on its daily chart. NEIRO braces for heightened volatility The official announcement included multiple warnings to traders. Notably, Binance will not support liquidations using the Futures Insurance Fund 60 minutes before contract settlement. It will use Immediate or Cancel Order (IOCO) to handle any liquidation in that timeframe, with positions that fail to satisfy margin requirements processed via Auto-Deleveraging (ADL). Binance has warned users to monitor and manage their NEIRO positions as that period could witness amplified volatility and liquidity crunches. Users are strongly advised to actively monitor and manage open positions during the final hours, as this period may be subject to heightened volatility and reduced liquidity. Moreover, the exchange revealed it might adopt various protective procedures without notice. That includes adjusting funding rates, leverage, price index constituents, and margin tiers to safeguard against extreme conditions. What does it mean for the project? While delisting perpetual contracts doesn’t remove the coins from spot markets, it limits derivatives trading activity. That translates to reduced user activity, which can translate to lower liquidity. With Binance’s move, NEIRO traders who rely on perpetuals for speculation or hedging will have to find exposure on different platforms or trading pairs. The exchange didn’t clarify the reasons behind removing NEIRO’s perpetual contract. However, the move is likely to ensure market stability and manage risk. That happens whenever the contract’s trading volume plunges or volatility becomes overwhelming to handle. NEIRO exhibits massive bearishness after prolonged downsides. The meme coin has lost over 60% of its value in the past year. It has failed to rally despite broader market gains in the past months. Its sluggish price actions have forced its loyal investors to exit . NEIRO price outlook The altcoin leads the downside after losing over 20% within the past 24 hours. NEIRO trades $0.03114. Chart by CoinMarketCap The 260% uptick in daily trading volume signals intensified user activity, potentially from traders and holders exiting after Binance’s announcement. With the current broader market dip, NEIRO’s price will likely dip further before gaining ground. The post NEIRO price dips 20% as Binance confirms contract delisting appeared first on Invezz

title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: Crypto CEO Says Every US Bank Will Soon Hold BTC – Get In Before Wall Street Does
body: Bitcoin is at $112,870, down 2.46% in the last 24 hours, with a market cap of $2.24 trillion. Despite the pullback, people are starting to think US banks will open the floodgates to mainstream adoption soon. Alessio Quaglini, CEO of Hong Kong-based Hex Trust, says regulation is the last hurdle to full institutional participation. “Give it a few months, every single bank in the U.S. will provide custody services for Bitcoin,” Quaglini said in a recent interview. “That’s when we’ll have real adoption—when banks start offering Bitcoin deposits, trading, and structured products.” His view reflects a growing belief that once U.S. regulators finalize rules, the banking sector will follow swiftly. While banks worldwide have run pilots, few have gone live without clear U.S. approval. Quaglini calls American oversight the “global benchmark” that sets the tone for financial markets everywhere. Hex Trust Expands Institutional Footprint Founded in 2018, Hex Trust offers custody, trading, lending, and staking services to large institutions. Licensed in Hong Kong, Singapore, Dubai, and Europe, the firm has scaled rapidly—growing from $300,000 in seed funding to more than 200 employees and over a million end-users via institutional partnerships. The company raised $6 million in Series A funding in 2021 and aims to hit $20 million in revenue by 2025, with long-term ambitions of hundreds of millions and a potential IPO. “We want to be the J.P. Morgan of Asia in crypto,” Quaglini said. He also sees stablecoins as a parallel disruptor, predicting they will replace the SWIFT network for cross-border payments. “They’re faster, cheaper, programmable money,” he added, warning that traditional remittance firms like Western Union could struggle as adoption accelerates. Hex Trust’s strategy contrasts with U.S.-listed peers such as Coinbase and Galaxy Digital. While those firms rely heavily on retail trading fees or proprietary trading income, Hex Trust focuses on institutional custody to limit exposure to volatility. Bitcoin Price Forecast: Key Levels Ahead Technically , Bitcoin has broken down from the channel, below $116,000 support and now at $112,900, close to the 200-EMA at $113,450. The decline produced long red candles like a three black crows pattern, which often means more weakness to come. Bitcoin Price Chart – Source: Tradingview The RSI is 26, oversold, but we need confirmation via bullish engulfing or hammer candles before calling a reversal. Immediate support is at $113,450, then $110,820 and $108,770. Resistance is at $115,000-$116,200, where a breakout could propel us to $117,900 and $119,300. #Bitcoin broke below $116K support, now testing $113K near the 200-EMA. RSI at 26 shows oversold, but no reversal yet. Key zones: $110.8K support / $116.2K resistance. pic.twitter.com/QK0cXraKWD — Arslan Ali (@forex_arslan) September 22, 2025 For now, aggressive traders can short below $115,000 with stops above $116,200. More cautious traders can wait for a confirmed reversal at $110,800 before getting long. Despite the near-term bearish pressure, the longer term trend of higher lows since summer is still intact, so we could see a bounce to $120,000. As Quaglini says, US regulatory clarity will be the ultimate catalyst. Once banks add Bitcoin to mainstream finance, Wall Street will enter the party and drive the next big move. For investors, the message is clear: the window to position before banks and institutions pile in is closing. Presale Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) Combines BTC Security With Solana Speed Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) is positioning itself as the first Bitcoin-native Layer 2 powered by the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM). Its goal is to expand the BTC ecosystem by enabling lightning-fast, low-cost smart contracts, decentralized apps, and even meme coin creation. By combining BTC’s unmatched security with Solana’s high-performance framework, the project opens the door to entirely new use cases, including seamless BTC bridging and scalable dApp development. The team has put strong emphasis on trust and scalability, with the project audited by Consult to give investors confidence in its foundations. Momentum is building quickly.
